p: Just rec'd your letter and Hilda's, and am so glad for both. I can't see anything for you to worry about, Mona. Everything is really all right, and the future looks anything but gloomy.
Hiddy, old girl, this letter is for you too, but I'll write you later. I'm one of your fans.
Alice, don't be troubled. You'll swim high through everything. I'm so glad you can push on moderately with dancing.
